EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2019-01-24
EmailTemplate.subject: Announcing New Tools from Pivotal and IBM
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
January 25, 2019 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/new-tools-from-pivotal-ibm-pave-the-way-for-java-ee-websphere-apps-to-move-to-cloud-foundry-and-kubernetes?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Announcing New Tools from Pivotal and IBM The best way to move Java EE apps to cloud. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/new-tools-from-pivotal-ibm-pave-the-way-for-java-ee-websphere-apps-to-move-to-cloud-foundry-and-kubernetes?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/videos/leveling-up-at-skygen-usa?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Leveling Up at SkyGen USA How does SkyGen USA power the largest insurers in the United States? It’s simple: through the use of technology-enabled solutions and data analytics, they’re able to be efficient, reduce cost, and bring the best service to their clients. Now, SkyGen USA wants to be even better. Watch the Interview <[[https://content.pivotal.io/videos/leveling-up-at-skygen-usa?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://pivotal.io/customers/comcast?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Customers Come First at Comcast Learn how Comcast utilizes Pivotal Cloud Foundry to add new features and services to the Comcast customer experience. Check it Out <[[https://pivotal.io/customers/comcast?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://springonetour.io/?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <http://www.engineerbetter.com/blog/pks/> Engineer Better: PKS—a Painkiller for Kubernetes By leveraging the BOSH deployment tool under the hood, PKS is able to solve many of the most common headaches for Kubernetes operators. Learn More <[[http://www.engineerbetter.com/blog/pks/]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/developer-secure-containers-for-the-cyberspace-battlefield?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Developer Secure Containers for the Cyberspace Battlefield Jason Scanga of VMWare and Chris Saunders of Pivotal do a security deep-dive of PKS at SpringOne Platform 2018. Take a Closer Look <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/developer-secure-containers-for-the-cyberspace-battlefield?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://pivotal.io/event/partner-days/seattle?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Pivotal Partner Days, Seattle Join us February 26-28th in Seattle for Pivotal Partner Days. Pair with Pivotal developers to collaboratively build, test and deploy software on Pivotal Cloud Foundry. Get the Lowdown <[[https://pivotal.io/event/partner-days/seattle?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/451-pivotal-digital-transformation-paas-kubernetes-serverless?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Pivotal Pushes Digital Transformation with PaaS, Kubernetes, and Serverless 451 Research breaks down how the Pivotal Cloud Foundry portfolio allows our customers to effectively create, release, and operate cloud-native applications. Read the Report <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/451-pivotal-digital-transformation-paas-kubernetes-serverless?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Upcoming Events 01/29, Securing Microservices with Spring and Pivotal Cloud Foundry, Webinar, EMEA <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/jan-29-securing-microservices-spring-and-pivotal-cloud-foundry-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
3/18-3/22, Greenplum Summit at Postgres Conf, New York <[[ https://pivotal.io/event/greenplum-summit]]>
4/02-4/04, Cloud Foundry Summit North America, Philadelphia <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/event/nasummit2019/]]>
Check Out Upcoming Pivotal Events <[[http://info.pivotal.io/UPBY0aJ0NU0ICz02nA030DG]]>
